dimensions.label: Decision Making Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin make decisions?

options.description: Your FarTwin will analyze data and facts to make informed decisions, weighing pros and cons carefully.
Your FarTwin will trust their instincts and make decisions based on gut feelings, rather than analyzing data or evidence.

dimensions.label: Problem Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach problem-solving?

options.description: Your FarTwin will break down complex problems into smaller, manageable parts and solve them using logic and reason.
Your FarTwin will think outside the box and generate innovative solutions by combining different ideas and perspectives.

dimensions.label: Collaboration Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin collaborate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will take charge and lead teams, making decisions and setting goals without hesitation.
Your FarTwin will work closely with others, listening to their ideas and building on them to achieve common goals.

dimensions.label: Technical Expertise
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technical challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will focus on the intricacies of technical details, ensuring accuracy and precision in their work.
Your FarTwin will take a step back and look at the big picture, focusing on overall strategy and high-level goals.

dimensions.label: Innovation Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach new ideas?

options.description: Your FarTwin will carefully weigh the risks and benefits of introducing new ideas, cautious not to disrupt existing processes.
Your FarTwin will be open to trying new approaches and experimenting with untested ideas, even if they carry some level of risk.

dimensions.label: Learning Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning?

options.description: Your FarTwin will learn by doing, preferring experiential learning and hands-on experience to traditional classroom instruction.
Your FarTwin will focus on theoretical knowledge and abstract concepts, seeking to understand the underlying principles of a subject before applying them.

dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Time Management Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin manage their time?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be optimistic about their ability to complete tasks on time, managing their schedule to meet deadlines.
Your FarTwin will be cautious and realistic about the amount of time required for tasks, leaving some buffer time for unexpected delays.
